======================
Serial - Communication
======================

Currently one implementation variant is available:

.. contents:: :local:

Arduino
-------

The example shows a `pyWisp` implementation for an UART communication with a ÂµC (Arduino) and consists of two parts.

The server part includes the whole Arduino files with the `Min`-Protocol.

.. include:: ../../examples/arduino/server/README.rst
   :start-after: sphinx-marker

The visualization part includes the `pyWisp` project with all needed files.
